derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from medieval Latin castellatus, from Latin castellum (see castle)

entry.tran: 雉堞状的；建成城堡形的
entry.def: A castellated wall or building looks like a castle.

means.word_mean: 1. (of a building) having turrets and battlements in the style of a castle
